scripts.collect-news: node -e "const { FrenchNewsCollector } = require('./dist/lib/news-collector.js'); const collector = new FrenchNewsCollector(); collector.collectNews().then(result => console.log('Collecté', result.newArticles, 'nouveaux articles'));"
scripts.collect-news-ts: npx tsx -e "import { FrenchNewsCollector } from './src/lib/news-collector'; const collector = new FrenchNewsCollector(); collector.collectNews().then(result => console.log('Collecté', result.newArticles, 'nouveaux articles'));"
